scripts.swagger:gen: rimraf src/app/generated/vm-api/* && curl --insecure http://localhost:4302/swagger/v1/swagger.json --output swagger.json && @openapitools/openapi-generator-cli generate -i ./swagger.json -g typescript-angular -o src/app/generated/vm-api %npm_package_config_openapiArgs%
scripts.swagger:gen-docker: cross-var $npm_package_config_deleteGeneratedCommand && cross-env-shell docker run --rm -v $INIT_CWD:/local openapitools/openapi-generator-cli:v6.2.0 generate -i http://host.docker.internal:4302/swagger/v1/swagger.json?format=openapi -g typescript-angular -o /local/src/app/generated/vm-api $npm_package_config_openapiArgs
scripts.swagger:gen-docker-player: rimraf src/app/generated/player-api/* && cross-env-shell docker run --rm -v $INIT_CWD:/local openapitools/openapi-generator-cli:v6.2.0 generate -i http://host.docker.internal:4300/swagger/v1/swagger.json?format=openapi -g typescript-angular -o /local/src/app/generated/player-api --skip-validate-spec %npm_package_config_openapiArgs%

scriptComments.docker:stack:proxy: // Runs the entire caster vm with proxy settings
scriptComments.docker:destroy: // Destroys the docker vm, data retained
